root.name: Page Chronica
root.description: OverviewPage Chronica is a platformer from Red Hare Studios for the PlayStation 3. In it, librarian of the Infinite Palace, Topez, must travel through the World of Stories to cleanse The Big Bad's corruption. Drawing inspiration from word games like Scrabble, it features a magic system where the main character spells draw power from the complexity of words spelled out by the player.
